title: Elon Musk is Actually Buying Twitter
description:
Twitter announced today that it plans to sell itself to Elon Musk for $44 billion. WSJ’s Liz Hoffman explains the unusual nature of how the deal came together and what it could mean for Twitter.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
